seo.title: Alex Craviotto's Portfolio
seo.description: You can change the world with code, or at least make it a little bit better. I'm a software engineer with a passion for creating and improving applications. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

hero.title: Hey, I'm Alex Craviotto
hero.subtitle: I am a self-taught software engineer from Spain. Right now I'm focusing on becoming a full stack web developer to create amazing experiences in frontend and scalable and secure infrastructure for the backend.

whatido.title: What I Do ðŸ’­
whatido.subtitle: I'm passionate about everything related to technology, from designing a prototype to planning an architecture for a specific software. I love collaborating on projects, but I also like to start my own ideas. What I like most about programming is that it gives you the power to create whatever you want, from anywhere in the world.

projects.title: Projects ðŸš€
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

list.title: ConversaLink | AI Powered Chatbot
list.description: Revolutionize customer service and lead acquisition with ConversaLink, an AI chatbot custom-tailored for your business. Effortlessly elevate communication, presence, and optimize connections. Level up your outreach game with seamless automation.

list.title: Reminiscencefy | Auto-generated monthly playlists
list.description: Relive your memories through music, automatically generated monthly playlists in Spotify, reaching thousands of users and learning how to manage them, reaching thousands of users and learning how to manage them, and how to monetize the service by giving visibility to medium and small artists on the rise

list.title: Speedsive | Viral Video Maker
list.description: Automate the process and upload videos that compile music with altered speed, thanks to the rise of tiktok has created a very profitable youtube trend that allows you to gain views and subscribers relatively quickly This trend consists of uploading videos that compile viral songs that are on tiktok and increase or decrease the speed (sped up or slowed songs) Speedsive is in charge of automating all this, both video creation and uploading to Youtube

list.title: Classcord | Discord Bot
list.description: Classcord is a Discord bot that helps teachers and students to manage their classes, assignments, and grades. It is a tool that helps to organize the classes and the students, it is a tool that helps to organize the classes and the students, it is a tool that helps to organize the classes and the students, it is a tool that helps to organize the classes and the students. It reaches more than 400K users and has a very active community. Was verified by Discord.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: I have collaborated on various projects that have allowed me to learn and grow as a software engineer. They have provided me with knowledge and insight into the professional business world. I love building things on my own, but I also enjoy working on projects that motivate me.
